model.papers

Class PaperManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.papers.PaperManager

  • public class PaperManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class manages papers for the conferences.
    Version:
    11-18-2013
    Author:
    Mohammad Juma, Tim Mikeladze, Srdjan Stojcic

      • submitPaper

        @Permission(level=100)
public static void submitPaper(int conferenceID,
                               int authorID,
                               java.lang.String title,
                               java.lang.String description,
                               java.io.File file)
                        throws DatabaseException,
                               java.io.IOException
        Submits a paper to the conference.
        Precondition:
        requires conference ID >0;
        Postcondition:
        ensures A paper is submitted
        Parameters:
        conferenceID - the conference id to submit to
        authorID - the author's id
        title - the paper title
        description - the paper description
        file - the paper's file
        Throws:
        DatabaseException - the database exception
        java.io.IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
